resources.string: This is the help screen for GolfPal
GolfPal provides the user with a quick and easy way to manage a list of courses and your favourite courses.
For more information about GolfPal or to provide feedback please visit our website.
You have no courses added, go for a round!
1. To add course to your list go to \'Course Check In\' and enter the course details.
2. To favourite a course press the icon to the left of course on the home page list.
3. To view your favourite courses click the favourite courses button.
4. To delete a course click the red icon to the right side of the course on the home page list.
5. To remove course from favourites press the red icon to the right of the course on the favourites list.
You have no favourite courses yet!
